### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE medications (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    batch_number VARCHAR(50),
    expiration_date DATE
)


CREATE TABLE medication_inventory (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    medication_id INT,
    quantity INT,
    location VARCHAR(100)
)


CREATE TABLE medication_batches (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    medication_id INT,
    batch_number VARCHAR(50),
    expiration_date DATE,
    quantity INT
)


CREATE TABLE locations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100),
    address VARCHAR(255)
)

### STATEMENT

TRUNCATE TABLE medications;
